div.p: My Primary School years were absolutely, you know, normal you know pre-teenage stuff and my High School years, my Secondary schooling
was harder, my parents split up during that period and I went to 4 different, whatâ€™s the equivalent to GCSE, so in my GCSE years I went to 4 different
schools so that was really hard because I really love, I loved learning and being fragmented so much was hard to be able to find a groove
so it all went a bit Pete Tong from there...
